project.description:
Chocolate Doom - A Doom source port that accurately reproduces
the experience of Doom as it was played in the 1990s.
Builds with: GNU make
Homepage: http://www.chocolate-doom.org/wiki/index.php/Chocolate_Doom
Downloads: http://sourceforge.net/projects/chocolate-doom/files/chocolate-doom

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PKG_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the download tarball and source directory

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_ARCH
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Build architecture to use when compiling Chocolate Doom

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
### DOWNLOAD/UNPACK DEBIAN PACKAGES if [ ! -d $WORKSPACE/artifacts ]; then mkdir $WORKSPACE/artifacts fi
/bin/bash $HOME/src/jenkins/config.git/scripts/deb_download_unpack.sh \ --pkgdir $HOME/pkgs \ --output $WORKSPACE/artifacts \ --target-arch $BUILD_ARCH \ -- libasound2 libasound2-dev libdbus-1-3 libdbus-1-dev \ libflac8 libflac-dev libglib2.0-0 libglib2.0-dev \ libmikmod2 libmikmod2-dev libogg0 libogg-dev \ libsdl1.2debian libsdl1.2-dev libsdl-mixer1.2 libsdl_mixer1.2-dev \ libsdl-net1.2 libsdl_net1.2-dev \ libsmpeg0 libsmpeg-dev libsndfile1 libsndfile1-dev \ libvorbis0a libvorbis-dev util-linux

#/bin/bash $HOME/src/jenkins/config.git/scripts/unpack_build_artifacts.sh --delete \ # -- libsdl libmikmod libsndfile util-linux alsa-lib libglib dbus \ # flac libogg libvorbis smpeg libsdl_mixer libsdl_net
# sdl-config #/bin/bash $HOME/src/jenkins/config.git/scripts/munge_lib_config.sh \ # --file sdl-config --unmunge # libmikmod-config #/bin/bash $HOME/src/jenkins/config.git/scripts/munge_lib_config.sh \ # --file libmikmod-config --unmunge
# munge RPATH #/bin/bash $HOME/src/jenkins/config.git/scripts/munge_rpath.sh

### MUNGE PACKAGE FILES /bin/bash $HOME/src/jenkins/config.git/scripts/munge_pkg_contents.sh \ -- artifacts/usr/bin/sdl-config \ artifacts/usr/bin/libmikmod-config \ artifacts/usr/bin/smpeg-config \ artifacts/usr/lib/powerpc-linux-gnu/pkgconfig

### CLEAN SOURCE DIRECTORY cd ${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION} make clean
### DELETE OUTPUT AND ARTIFACTS DIRECTORIES /bin/bash $HOME/src/jenkins/config.git/scripts/delete_dir.sh \ -- $WORKSPACE/output $WORKSPACE/artifacts
